summary: This is an internal FBI email chain from July 29, 2020, in which a Supervisory Special Agent (SSA) from the FBI New York Office requests assistance for Squad C-20 (VCACIHT) related to the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation. The email seeks to identify available agents for this high-profile case.

persons.name: Supervisory Special Agent FBI New York Office
persons.context: The sender of the initial email requesting assistance for Squad C-20 related to the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: A Supervisory Special Agent whose approval is needed for an agent to assist on the Epstein/Maxwell case.

connections.person1: Supervisory Special Agent FBI New York Office
connections.description: Both are FBI agents involved in coordinating assistance for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.
The SA indicates they need approval from their SSA to assist on the case.

events.title: FBI Request for Assistance on Epstein/Maxwell Case
events.description: An internal FBI email is sent seeking agent assistance for Squad C-20's ongoing investigation into Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.
personsInvolved: Supervisory Special Agent FBI New York Office

keyFacts: The FBI's Squad C-20 (VCACIHT) was actively investigating the Epstein/Maxwell case as of July 2020.
The investigation was considered a 'high profile case' and a 'unique opportunity' within the FBI.
The email chain shows internal FBI coordination to allocate resources to the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.
Approval from a Supervisory Special Agent (SSA) was required for agents to assist on the case.
